proIntro.1: Full-stack developer with a front-end specialization (React, Vue, Angular), I design modern, accessible and high-performance interfaces, while ensuring clean back-end integration (Node.js, PHP).
proIntro.2: Certified Microsoft Azure (AZ-900 & AZ-204), I continuously engage in tech monitoring, particularly around cloud, modern architecture, and DevOps tools.
proIntro.3: My goal is to contribute to meaningful and impactful projects, with a strong focus on user experience. I value teamwork, knowledge sharing (mentor/mentee), and environments where quality matters.
proIntro.4: I have worked on SharePoint intranet designs using SPFx (headless CMS mode) and custom HR tools to help manage talent pools efficiently.
